Kyosuke!
Turn on the TV!
The TV!
What is the matter this early in the morning?
Just turn it on!
You will know when you see it!
Did something happen?
REN HONJO'S LOVE LIFE REVEALED!
REN HONJO'S LOVE LIFE REVEALED!
The guru is on TV!
REN HONJO'S LOVE LIFE REVEALED!
Hey, that is that cute girl!
Hey, you are right.
That cute girl is just as cute on TV, is not she?
I think she is more beautiful than cute.
No way!
Why is my sister's friend going out with Ren?!
What is the meaning of this?!
- I do not get it! - You are too loud.
I cannot hear the TV.
Could that mean the man who got my sister pregnant is also a celebrity?
She said he works in the music business, right?!
Who is he?!
Who is he?!
How should I know?
Why did not you ask her?
What kind of parent are you?
The guy got my daughter pregnant!
He must be a jerk!
Damn him!
Leave me alone!
So that is it?
You only pretended to be lenient to hide your jealousy.
Nami.
Let us just hope he works for a proper company.
He is coming over on Sunday.
Do not say anything rude to him, okay?
Huh?
He is coming over?
I cannot wait!
Black Stones is a band that Ren started back in his hometown.
The vocalist Nana, who was 16 years old at the time,
apparently frequented Ren's place, where Ren was living alone.
Ren was invited to join Trapnest just before their major debut,
so he left his band to join them, right?
And the two broke up once at that time.
Yes.
Leaving a band could get ugly and I hear Nana has a temper problem.
She apparently bad-mouthed Ren to people around her.
That is a lie!
Be quiet!
Whether it is true or not does not matter!
We are going to a commercial break.
What do you mean it does not matter?
Oh, Take.
Yeah, I am watching it.
Why at a busy time like this?
Give me a break.
I kept telling him to be careful.
This is going to be so troublesome.
What do you mean troublesome?!
That is a terrible thing to say!
I said be quiet!
Outsiders like you need to shut up!
No, sorry.
Outsiders?
So where is Ren?
He is not with that woman, is he?
Is that so?
Then keep an eye on him, so he does not get out.
Just make certain that he does not go and see that woman.
Yeah.
No, I will go to the office right away.
Nana!
Where do you think you are going?
I am going back home to see how Nana's doing!
I am worried about her!
Please do not do anything unnecessary.
But this is not unnecessary!
Takumi, there is something not right about you as a person!
If you think that, then do not force yourself to marry me.
If there is something not right about the father,
the child is not going to amount to much.
I am a good example.
Just having parents does not make it all right.
If it is hard by yourself,
then go back and raise it at your parents' place.
And do not worry.
I will support the child.
In any case, the way things are shaping up,
I will not be able to come here for some time.
Do as you wish.
Hello, Nana?!
Could the Takumi you were talking about be Takumi of Trapnest?!
No.
That is not possible, is it?
You are lying.
Tell me the truth.
When I think about it, everything adds up.
Why are you hiding it from me?
That is so cold of you.
Did you think I would tell anyone?
What is the matter?
Why are you crying?
Jun-chan. I,.,
I am not forcing myself to get married only for my baby's sake.
I know that.
I really love Takumi.
I know.
I am glad you realized that.
But I thought it was Nobu I am in love with.
That is just your imagination.
As long as a man treats you nice, it does not matter to you who it is.
That is not true.
I know that you feel bad for Nobu,
but it is much healthier to come to terms with your feelings
rather than convince yourself that you are doing it for money or for the child.
But it was easier to think that it was for those things.
Why is it that when I go after a guy,
I always end up with self-centered jerks like Mr. Asano and Takumi?
Huh?
I do not know.
So she loved Asano that much?
Enough to still talk about him?
Why cannot I treat the guys like Shoji and Nobu
with as much care as they showed me?
If Shoji did not get sick of me, I am sure we would have lived peacefully,
and that would have been the best for me.
CHILLS...
CHILLS...
Why is she talking about Shoji at this stage?
CHILLS...
CHILLS...
And that would have been the best?
CHILLS...
CHILLS...
At this rate, I will never be happy for the rest of my life!
At this rate, I will never be happy for the rest of my life!
- Pass. - Huh?
HUH?
PASS - Pass. - Huh?
- Pass. - Huh?
Calm her down.
Come on.
Just say something that will make her feel good.
Hello, Nana?
Do you have to delay your wedding
because Trapnest is caught in this mess?
WAAA!!
WAAA!
Takumi, you idiot!
You bastard!
Takumi, you idiot!
You bastard!
Anyway, come by our place.
We will listen to your complaints.
What about class?
No, I will be fine.
But above everything, I want to see Nana.
I want to apologize to her properly and make up with her,
and I am thinking about going now to see how she is doing.
Huh?
Go to the apartment?
Right now would not be a good time.
Huh?
There are reporters at your apartment.
What?
We are in front of the residence of BLAST's Nana.
Oh no!
I am going to be late!
Who is it so early in the morning?
Yes?!
Who is it?!
We are from Search.
Huh?
If you are selling something, I do not want it!
You are Nana Osaki, right?
We would like to ask some questions
regarding your relationship with Ren Honjo.
It is one thing to show Ren's place,
but why are they showing the guru's home, too?
She is not a celebrity yet!
It is a unique building, and coupled with the surrounding view,
you can easily tell where it is.
They should sue them for this!
What is Yasu doing?
Is not he a lawyer?!
Do something about it!
Anyway, Nana, given what we are seeing,
it is quite possible that they have already found out that Nana had a roommate.
You could end up being showered with questions.
It is better if you do not go.
But Nana's...
I understand how you feel, but think this through.
It would be nothing but trouble if they find out who you are.
What if they find out about your relationship with Takumi?
If the media made a big deal about it,
Takumi will end up in an unfavorable position,
and you and your child will have a tough time living a normal life.
Please do not do anything unnecessary.
Nana will be all right.
She is a smart girl and she has her band members.
I am a lot more worried about you.
Do not go now.
Nana Osaki!
Search... does he mean Search, the weekly magazine?
Please come out for a moment and talk to us.
We saw you on TV.
TV?
If you do not hurry up and give us an explanation,
things could get pretty ugly for you.
An explanation?
Is that okay with you?
I do not understand what he is talking about.
Is he threatening me?
And finally, let us take another look at BLAST's live video.
Their debut single is expected to be released soon by Gaia Records.
I can hardly wait.
Nobu...
This program is kind of strange.
It is like they are taking advantage of Ren's scandal to promote us.
Nobu!
Shin!
- You are here.
- Mr. Kawano.
Neither of you would answer your cell phone,
so I was getting worried.
I am sorry.
I had turned mine off because friends were calling me nonstop.
Then did you see the broadcast?
Yes, we saw it.
Then I can get right to the point.
There is a car waiting outside.
Pack your bags quickly.
Pack our bags?
Just in case, you are to hide in a hotel until things calm down.
There is a good chance reporters will come here.
Wait a minute!
What in the world's going on?!
How come we are debuting all of a sudden?!
We will talk about it in the car.
We should hurry.
What about Nana?
I left Nana to Yasu.
I am sure he will be able to deal with the media in a professional manner.
Do not worry about it.
I am worried!
With all this mess going on, Nana will not be able to sing!
Is Gaia behind that show?!
That is the video we sent in when we were promoting ourselves, is not it?!
But that video had been sent to many places, right?
I hate to say this, but I cannot trust you, Mr. Kawano.
You keep saying things to satisfy us, but they have all been lies.
I do not think I am going to be able to trust anyone anymore.
In fact, both Yasu and I received blocked calls this morning
telling us to watch Morning Seven.
What is that?!
A telephone threat?!
TOO SCARY
What is that?!
A telephone threat?!
TOO SCARY
Whoever's behind this, I am not clear what their motive is,
but what is clear is that they are doing this so the public will pay attention to you.
But who would do such a thing other than Gaia?!
The only one who would benefit now by promoting our band is Gaia!
You really are a good person right down to the core, Nobu.
You do not think that perhaps the objective is not to promote the band,
but to crush it?
Everyone who watched that on TV will think it is weird.
You are a member of Black Stones, are not you?
Did you watch Morning Seven?
Is it true that Nana's the one who put that padlock on Ren?
What did you think when Ren left your band to join Trapnest?
What is going on?!
He is a friend of Ren's woman!
Did not Nana sell this information herself?!
It is a publicity stunt!
Taking advantage of Trapnest's popularity!
SILENCE
Listen, you guys.
If you have the time to mess with other people's gardens,
try making your own flowers bloom.
REN HONJO'S LOVE LIFE REVEALED?!
REN HONJO'S LOVE LIFE REVEALED?!
Back to you from Ren's love interest Nana's home.
Oh, boy.
He is made enemies outta the media.
That idiot.
He is so cool!
TAKUMI!
TAKUMI!
Yasu is really awesome!
I am sorry that I called him baldy!
Yasu is really awesome!
I am sorry that I called him baldy!
I LOVE YOU Yasu is really awesome!
I am sorry that I called him baldy!
I LOVE YOU I want to be Yasu!
But I do not want to be bald!
I want to be Yasu!
But I do not want to be bald!
WHAT SHOULD I DO?
I want to be Yasu!
But I do not want to be bald!
But look at Ren's popularity.
All the talk shows are talking about the same subject.
Is not that nice?
It just shows how peaceful this world is.
PEEVED...
PEEVED...
But it is supposed to be about Ren's passionate love,
But it is supposed to be about Ren's passionate love,
but they are talking about BLAST more than our band.
Oh?
You hate to lose, huh?
No, I do not care if I win or lose, as long as we get attention.
Let us hold a press conference, Takumi.
We will have Ren tell them something really cool.
Like
Do not pick on my woman or something like that.
Get real.
I am not going to be part of this silly party.
Do not come crying to me if BLAST walks off with everything.
That is fine by me.
We will maintain our own pace and rely on our talent.
As long as our CDs sell, everything's fine.
You sure are confident.
Do you really think that you are the best in the whole wide world?
Of course not.
But I do think that you are the best in the world.
Do not add any more pressure!
- I hate you!
- Mari.
Coffee.
Yes.
Nana!
This is the worst.
Rumors are out that this is your publicity stunt.
Does not that make you angry?!
The last thing I wanted was for my name to be known as Ren's woman.
If you will talk to me, I will write an article to explain your views!
You are being a pest, damn it.
Nana!
Do not try to be friendly with me.
It is all over now.
- It is all fallen apart because of you guys!
- Nana!
The guy from Black Stones.
Do not dare come inside!
Go away!
Come on.
I am only giving her a chance to redeem...
Do not act like you are doing us a favor.
Never come close to our vocalist again.
I am going to write about what happened just now!
If you want to save the reputation of the legal firm that is been so good to you,
submit your resignation letter!
Nana.
Are you all right?
Ow!
You idiot!
What are you acting so cool for?!
Think about the position you are in first, baldy!
It is okay.
I do not hold an important position at the firm,
so quitting will not affect anyone.
But it will affect you!
If word gets out that you used violence, no one's going to hire you!
Do not throw your life away!
It is okay.
Now I can go out and gamble to my heart's content.
This guy's a fool.
All our members are fools.
Nobu got disowned by his parents and dumped by his girlfriend.
Yet he still clings onto his guitar.
Unless something is done about Shin, he is on a direct path to destruction.
If I do not sing, we have no future.
We are in front of the home of Trapnest's Ren.
PUBLICITY STUNT BY BLAST?!
WHAT ARE REN'S THOUGHTS?
PUBLICITY STUNT BY BLAST?!
WHAT ARE REN'S THOUGHTS?

PUBLICITY STUNT BY BLAST?!
WHAT ARE REN'S THOUGHTS?
this being a publicity stunt by Black Stones' Nana...
Mr. Honjo!
We got directions from the agency.
You are to fly to England this afternoon.
I am running away?!
Am I a criminal?
It is for a shoot for the cover and promotion video.
We had planned to do it in Japan, but with this commotion...
You will spend about half a month there, so you should be able to relax a bit.
The other band members and staff will be going tomorrow,
but you and Mr. Takeda will be going ahead.
I will drive you to the airport.
I got it.
I will get ready right away.
Things should be a lot quieter if it is only me and Take.
Um, Mr. Honjo.
Are you sure you do not have to help your girlfriend out?
If you want to retaliate on the media, I will not stop you.
Sadly, my woman has too much pride.
The more I try to protect her in front of the public eye,
the more miserable she will be.
What do you mean?
I doubt that!
Why do you always do exactly as the agency tells you to?!
No, she really is like that.
This aggressive change in schedule must be Takumi's idea!
Mr. Honjo, you ought to do as you wish!
Kinoshita, you are missing the point here.
Music is not fun and games for us.
Trapnest is no longer Takumi's own castle.
It is a major project that involves the agency,
the record label, and other companies.
I cannot just do as I please.
Being in a band is like sharing a single destiny.
Right now, the people I must protect
are not the friends I abandoned long ago.
Nana, please make a statement.
When Ren was invited to join Trapnest,
was it you that broke off the relationship?
Did you get back together with him to take advantage of him?
Ren says he has no comment about this.
How do you feel about that?
Are you happy that you are getting all the attention according to your plan?
This is stupid.
Say something.
I do not need to say anything.
Ren understands me, and I know the position Ren is in.
There is no need to make a fuss.
But right now, there is one thing I must say no matter what.
Please say something!
I will not let them ruin my life.
Just watch me, Hachiko.
I will make your wishes come true!
I hope you will be on TV a lot.
Let me see you as you continue singing.
Oh, I feel much better now.
I am glad.
That is all from the home of Nana, the woman of the hour.
She just threw them a smoke bomb.
The title of the next show will be something like
A fearless Nana sends a mysterious message to her pet dog.
That will take them even further off track.
Yeah, she is fearless all right.
And I am sure they thought she was talking about a dog.
You know, Hachi...
Ever since that day, I was able to get right back up,
no matter how many times I got struck down...
REN HONJO THE DARK PAST OF THE BEAUTIFUL WOMAN WHO STOLE THE ROCK-N-ROLL HERO'S HEART.
REN HONJO THE DARK PAST OF THE BEAUTIFUL WOMAN WHO STOLE THE ROCK-N-ROLL HERO'S HEART....because I knew you were always watching me.
